responses: Hi there, how can I help?

I currently work at the Texas Tech Advanced Technical Learning Center as a Lead Student Technician.

patterns: What are your current work expereinces
responses: I currently work at the Texas Tech Advanced Technical Learning Center as a Lead Student Technician.

My job is to ensure all day to day activities are carried effectively at the Texas Tech University Advanced Technical Learning Center. I image computer systems into texas tech domain network using scripts and monitor printers all around campus and install Quest Kace software to manage these computers through a server.
